channel.description: Recent content in Infrastructure on FinanClub

item.title: NOK
item.description: score:99 Chances: Nokia Oyj is getting back on its feet after a couple of challenging years. The company is focused on driving leadership in cloud-native software and as-a-service delivery models, with strong market positions in communications software, private wireless networks, and cognitive services.

item.title: CNM
item.description: score:-11 Chances: Core & Main, Inc. has seen substantial growth in its share price, with over a 100% increase this year. The company has announced multiple acquisitions and agreements to expand its product offerings and market reach. Institutions have substantial holdings in Core & Main, indicating significant influence over the company’s direction and performance.
